item.title: Book: Wizard of Once
item.description: This book is a book where you get to know a boy and a girl, both about the age of thirteen, the girl is a warrior, and the boy is a wizard. It begins, I suppose, with the wizard boy. He is called Xar (pronouneced Zar, don’t ask me why, spelling is WEIRD), and he is the most disobedient boy of all wizards. The girl is called Wish, and has a very frantic with fear bodyguard.
